A quick and dirty program to sign Taproot PSBTs with a given xpriv. This reuses the hot signer Rust
code so i don't have to reimplement everything in Python.

Usage:
```
cargo build --release
./target/release/taproot_signer "" xprv9s21ZrQH143K3fRVbj9JuCc3Eaph4F7AKXUtLGs9AWxWmhyMGq5ur5NqH3fDuiQZ6GamXbW7L3msaCwRbstxVqc3eP2FX3oa9wABxVzHr1k
```

Output:
```

```
